results.description: Sadio Mane scores his third goal at the Africa Cup of Nations before missing a penalty as Senegal beat Uganda to reach the quarter-finals.
results.shortTitle: Mane scores but misses penalty in Senegal win
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Uganda 0-1 Senegal

thumbnail.altText: Sadio Mane celebrates scoring for Senegal against Uganda at the Africa Cup of Nations

results.description: Follow live text coverage as Senegal take on Uganda in the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations.
results.shortTitle: Africa Cup of Nations: Mane scores one but misses penalty for Senegal
results.title: Uganda v Senegal live in the African Cup of Nations Round of 16

results.description: La fédération ougandaise a promis 6.000 dollars supplémentaires pour chaque joueur "en plus des conditions convenues".
results.shortTitle: CAN 2019 : l'équipe ougandaise met fin au boycott
results.title: L'Ouganda s'entraîne à nouveau après avoir obtenu une 'prime d'encouragement'

results.description: Liverpool forward Sadio Mane says it is his "absolute dream" to help Senegal win the Africa Cup of Nations for the first time.
results.shortTitle: Mane dreams of Afcon glory with Senegal
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Senegal forward Sadio Mane hopes to continue scoring run

results.description: The Cranes players refused to train on Tuesday in a row over payments at the tournament in Egypt.

results.description: Egypt maintain their perfect start to their Africa Cup of Nations campaign by beating Uganda in Cairo to win Group A.
results.shortTitle: Salah scores as Egypt beat Uganda
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Mohamed Salah scores as Egypt beat Uganda to win group

results.description: Egypt beat Uganda & DR Congo hammer Zimbabwe in the final round of Group A games at the 2019 African Cup of Nations.
results.title: Africa Cup of Nations: Salah & Elmohamady score as Egypt beat Uganda

results.description: Uganda and Zimbabwe play out an entertaining draw in Group A of the Africa Cup of Nations in Cairo.
